name: Moody (GGWTeam8)
description:
A downloadable game for Windows

The Game :

Moody is an interactive visual novel set in an abandoned colorful house that will put stars in your eyes.

When you wake up inside, meet a new friend who has been stuck in this mess for years and help him to escape.

Features :

  • Philosophical dialogues that will make you feel intense emotions
  • Innovative gameplay with a 6 button controller accompanied by LEDs that will show you the way (QTE)

Credits :
